subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nori Aoki hit a two-run triple, helping the host Kansas City Royals keep the lead for the second American League wild-card spot by beating the Detroit Tigers, 5-2.
snippet: Nori Aoki hit a two-run triple, helping the host Kansas City Royals keep the lead for the second American League wild-card spot by beating the Detroit Tigers, 5-2.
